variable.name: Individual_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier

variable.name: RPABFLAG
variable.description: =1 if form is present

variable.name: RPABCY
variable.description: CONTACT YEAR [4]

variable.name: RPAB01
variable.description: USUALLY HAVE A COUGH? Q1
variable.comment: For further information, consult the document Exam 2 Respiratory Symptoms & Physical Activity.pdf.

variable.comment: For further information, consult the document Exam 2 Respiratory Symptoms & Physical Activity.pdf.
